amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of April 30, 1997 as amendment No. 30 to require Public Housing Authorities to set preferences for at least 50 percent of the available units for families who live in substandard housing, pay more than 50 percent of their income for rent, or are involuntarily displaced at the time they are seeking housing assistance.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
